q: This is the fourth Pro Bowl for Michael Vick , who was the first pick of the 2001 draft.`` I feel like this one I had to work hard to get here,'' he said. This came in a different fashion due to the fact that I displayed different talents this year to show really what I can do in the passing game along with doing everything else. I think everything came together and it has worked out for me. Michael Vick shares reps this week with the QB of the team he once played for, Atlanta's Matt Ryan .`` It's great,'' Michael Vick said.`` Matt Ryan 's great. The coaching

Sinitta added that Simon Cowell had only recently accepted the fact that he wouldn't be able to judge both shows. People have said he'll fly backwards and forwards and do both. But he's not just a judge, he's also a mentor. That means he needs to stay in just one place. It's possible Simon Cowell will miss the UK version for a year and come back once the US one is settled in. Steve Jones is in the running to land the presenting gig on the US show ahead of Dermot O'Leary , who has made no secret of his desire to move Stateside.

then-candidate Barack Obama in the 2008 election, but said Sunday on CNN's`` State of the Union'' that he will wait to make a decision on whom to support in the next presidential election. I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley .`` I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.''``
